Capacities.Name: Partially Full
Capacities.Description:
Partially Full, also Partially Empty:
Extra parts can be either added or taken from this.
This means that it will neither back up nor be short on parts.
This means the inputs and outputs do not rely on each other which allows them to be calculated independently.
You can use this setting to separate parts of your factory for independent calculations.

Capacities.Name: Full
Capacities.Description:
Full:
Extra parts can be taken from this, but more parts cannot be added than are taken.
This means that it will never be short on parts but can back up.
This means the output does not rely on the input, but the input does rely on the output.
You may be able to get improved calculations using this setting (but not as good as Partially Full).

Capacities.Name: Empty
Capacities.Description:
Empty:
Extra parts can be added to this, but more parts cannot be taken than are added.
This means that it will never back up but can be short on parts.
This means the input does not rely on the output, but the output does rely on the input.
You may be able to get improved calculations using this setting (but not as good as Partially Full).

Capacities.Name: Input = Output
Capacities.Description:
Input = Output:
The input and outputs must match exactly.
This makes it the same as using a splurger but with a different icon.
